titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 331 1st Street in Carlstadt, New Jersey, as the "Staff Sergeant Frank T. Carvill and Lance Corporal Michael A. Schwarz Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Ms. Chu moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5133.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Ms. Chu objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by recorded vote (2/3 required): 409 - 0 (Roll no. 346).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

action.text: Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

committee.subcommittee: Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security
committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 1/4/2011--Public Law. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 331 1st Street in Carlstadt, New Jersey, as the "Staff Sergeant Frank T. Carvill and Lance Corporal Michael A. Schwarz Post Office Building."
